author: m.kalinin
content:
Once the validator is created the protocol will take the following actions to make it active:
1) set `activation_eligibility_epoch` to `current_epoch + 1` as soon as the validator is created
2) wait till `activation_eligibility_epoch` is finalized which is at least `2` more epochs
3) set `activation_epoch` to `current_epoch + MAX_SEED_LOOKAHEAD + 1`
It is at least `8` epochs in total
